actions.name: Mace
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +2 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 3 (1d6) bludgeoning damage plus 3 (1d6) necrotic or radiant damage (the acolyte's choice).

actions.name: Radiant Bolt
actions.desc: _Ranged Spell Attack:_ +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 6 (1d4+4) radiant damage.

actions.name: Spellcasting
actions.desc:
The acolyte casts one of the following spells using WIS as the spellcasting ability (spell save DC 13).
At will: _light_, _thaumaturgy_
3/day each: _bless_, _cure wounds_, _sanctuary_

special_abilities.name: Divine Providence
special_abilities.desc: Each friendly creature within 20 feet of the acolyte that isn't a Construct or Undead has advantage on death saves.
